job_Description: JOB DESCRIPTION AND POSITION REQUIREMENTS: The Departments of Biomedical Engineering (BME) and Engineering Science and Mechanics (ESM) seek applicants for a tenure-line/tenured faculty position with expertise at the forefront of development of Data Sciences or Machine Learning with particular emphasis on applications to Biological or Health Sciences.
